Posts.Content: Jul 22, 2008 11:53AM mamasick wrote: shocked i had surgury 3 weeks yesterday i had no insurance and i was scared  find the hospital in your area that will take you without insurance they will want some downpayment but i guarente you they will not turn you away  also there are  clinical tests done in many areas that you may qualify for i got a biopsy free there are programs available your doctor or hospital can give you names i made too much and did not have insurance byt got the surgury  the worse is chemo if you need it it can be as much as 100,000 i am looking into natural cures myself so if any one knows of any let me know and do not se a surgeon that you do not like try again cry if you like but see regular doctor for anti depressents you really have to be clear in your head to make decisions right now i will gladly help anyone at this stage write back if you want ive been there  done that
